about_the_game:
Fantasy Tavern Simulator as name suggests is all about running a tavern in fantasy setting.

Challenge yourself with fast paced beer serving and strategize how to furnish and maintain a tavern.

  • Fill mugs with beer and cook a meal! Keep up the pace or customers will leave.

  • Witness dances, music, fights and all kinds of magic done by your guests! Join them or make them stop.

  • Serve different meals and all kinds of beer, furnish your tavern however you like. Arriving guests will keep up with your choices.

  • Specialise your tavern to unlock special events and rooms.

Fast customer service will be expected of you. Juggling multiple orders a common occurance. Do not make your guests wait too long or else they will get angry and leave with bad taste in their mouth. Bad word spreads fast

Starting with regular Ale you will have ability to unlock a variety of different beverages! From bottom of the barrel Grog to top of the line Cider. From light Ales to heavy Wines. Choose wisely because some guests will appreciate different kinds of alcohol!

You will be able to cook all kind of things! Starting with soups and ending with magical stews. Just like alcohol different guests will appritiate different meals.

You will have to clean after your guests! Wash all the dishes and clean all the tables and floors. You might find different valuable tokens!

From tables and stools through skull piles to royal crests on the wall. Available furniture is vast and varied. Just like food and alcohol some guests will appriciate different kinds of furnishings than others.

You can unlock unique events, collectibles and achivements related to single social group. So if you wanna see it all you gotta play it multiple times!

short_description: Fantasy Tavern Simulator is a first-person 3D fast-paced simulator game. Serve beer, prepare food, furnish your tavern and take part in random events like brawls, royal feast or occult rituals. Make your guests feel welcome. Make your Tavern known!
